oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Real photo postcard of Fred Abel, Co. F, 322nd Inf. Regt., 81st Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A real photo postcard of Fred Abel of the 81st ("Wildcat") Div. His shoulder patch is that of his division and the chevron on his left sleeve indicates six months of overseas service. Abel, a Rhea County farmer, served as a cook in Co. F, 322nd Inf. Regt., 81st Div. The picture, printed in an oval, was probably taken in France as the address side is printed "Carte Postale." The card is not addressed, but he identified it as a souvenir of Lamalou-les-Bains.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Abel, Fred
